name: STANDBY (itch) (Rushiplays)
description:
A Working man name Keef Live his regular daily life at an electric company 

But this night wont be a regular night as he found a killer on the convenience Store

as he explore the area he will rethink his decision that he made 

Standby is a short free horror game averaging about 8-10 mins of playtime

has a creepy atmosphere and a short story line

This is my second Rpg horror game 

The tilesets are all from malibudarby/vexedenigma 

https://malibudarby.itch.io/

My yt channel

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCTnXgTBxvAs_JD0-d-a9RXg?view_as=subscriber

The cover art is made by Zy lie A talented artist who also made the art from the wine man

https://www.facebook.com/les.lie.7509836

The main character is A youtuber name Corpsebombkeef

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC7eBIehVyBmsRUjMGVQhcWA

And the music are royalty free from 

https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

As always thanks for downloading my game i also have a patreon account in case if you wanna support me on my future projects

https://www.patreon.com/join/rushiplays?

Here is my official discord so u can see some upcoming projects

thanks everyone for playing my game
